pkgmetadata.longdescription: # KvaserData / Data science:---------------------- **timeseries.plot** : plot methods for time series data- **desc** : Simple summary statistics for NumPy/Pandas objects- **dag** : Simulation from structural equation models / generalized linear modelsUtilities:---------------------- **blob_storage** : tool for working with azure blob storage- **reload** : easy reloading of modules- **mproc** : CLI tool for multiple file processing
